summary: This document appears to be preparation notes for trial testimony, likely for a witness or investigator, dated December 5, 2021. It contains corrected or clarified statements regarding recollections about Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, and others, and is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as having called at least once to ask about working. Referred to by initials 'JE'.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned by initials 'IM' (likely referring to her maiden name initials) in connection with references about cleaning up after parties.

persons.name: Gizele
persons.context: Mentioned alongside 'Maxine' as someone who, along with her friends, was referenced in relation to cleaning up after parties.

persons.name: Maxine
persons.context: Mentioned alongside 'Gizele' as someone who, along with her friends, was referenced in relation to cleaning up after parties.

connections.description: Both are mentioned in the same context of the witness's recollections about activities and communications.
Maxwell is mentioned as referencing Gizele and her friends in the context of cleaning up after parties.
Maxwell is mentioned as referencing Maxine and her friends in the context of cleaning up after parties.
Mentioned together as individuals referenced by Maxwell in relation to post-party cleanup.

events.title: Trial Testimony Preparation
events.description: Preparation notes were created for trial testimony, containing new, corrected, or clarified witness statements.

keyFacts: The document is preparation notes for trial testimony, dated December 5, 2021, and is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs.
A witness recalls Jeffrey Epstein calling at least once to ask about working.
The witness recalls Ghislaine Maxwell and individuals named Gizele and Maxine being referenced in relation to cleaning up after parties.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings and witness preparation related to the Epstein case as of late 2021.
